input.sentences: the thompsons went on a vacation
they spent most of their time in the pool at their hotel .
the room they stayed in was very spacious
[male] thompson and his dad got a picture with the hotel manager -- he was so helpful .

output.sentences: We have a perfect view for our Thompson vacation .
We spent alot of time in the pool to relax.
Our rooms were so spacious it was so cool.
We were so happy with this vacation spot we just had to meet the manager.
Nights were the best when you had entertainment like this.
